resources.string:
Introducing CFScanner, ultimate domain filter checking companion! This app effortlessly checks if a domain is filtered and finds clean Cloudflare CDN IPs to recover domain using SNI. Keep access to your domain with a clean Cloudflare IP. Get instant results and discover a comprehensive list of clean IPs associated with the domain. Break free from restrictions and unlock the web with CFScanner.
Thanks to IRCF.space and all other teams for providing Cloudflare IP ranges.
#اینترنت_برای_همه_یا_هیچکس
